source_sentence: 佛說一切如來真實攝大乘現證
translation: Buddha's teaching that all tathāgatas are truly included in the manifestation of the great vehicle
Samādhi-dajiaowang jing, vol. 4

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試光祿卿
translation: Minister of Light for the Tripiṭaka Translation of the Sutra of the Western Paradise, the Grand Master of the Chaofeng

source_sentence: 傳法大師賜紫沙門臣施護
translation: Zisha Menchen Shihu, bestowed by the great Dharma transmitter
translation of the imperial edict

source_sentence: 金剛界大曼拏羅廣大儀軌分第一之四爾時世尊不空成就如來。
translation: The Vajradhātu-maṇḍala Vast Ritual Procedure Part I.4 At the time, the Bhagavān was the accomplished Tathāgata who was not empty.

source_sentence: 印世尊大毘盧遮那如來及一切如來智故。
translation: That's because he was the World Honored Tathāgata Mahāvairocana and had the wisdom of all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 即入一切波羅蜜多三昧。
translation: He then entered the samādhi of all perfections.
He then gave rise to the vajra-supporting concentration.

source_sentence: 此名一切如來羯磨三昧即自印。
translation: This is called the karma-samādhi of all the tathāgatas, which is his own seal.
It comes out of his own mind.
It's called this great teaching.

source_sentence: 羯哩摩(二合)嚩日哩(二合一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first produces the mind of the Tathāgata, Kālīma (verse 2) and Vajri (verse 2) emerge.

source_sentence: 即現一切羯磨光明具德持金剛者。
translation: "Immediately, it shows up in all the karmic brilliance of the Vajra-wielding One of Great Merit.
In that karmic radiance, he creates a tiny dusty amount of light in all the worlds.

source_sentence: 成一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: It creates an image of the Tathāgata that's the subtlest amount of dust in all the worlds.
After he completely imprinted the wisdom of all the tathāgatas.
He then gathered them into one body.

source_sentence: 從是出現大金剛羯磨像。
translation: From there, a great vajra image of the Tathāgata in karma appears.

source_sentence: 周遍一切世界為量隨向方面。
translation: It circumscribes all the worlds as a measure of the direction it takes.

source_sentence: 於世尊大毘盧遮那如來左月輪中。
translation: He was standing in the left moon-wheel of the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata Mahāvairocana.
He stood in accord with reality.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉一切正覺尊　　多業金剛即我是　由一成於無盡故　　於有情界善作業此是一切如來智三昧。
translation: "Great is the honored Completely Enlightened One! The vajra of many activities is mine! Because one becomes inexhaustible, this is the samādhi of the knowledge of all tathāgatas that's skillfully worked in the realm of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 大灌頂金剛法性一切供養。
translation: The great consecration of the adamantine nature of reality is an offering to all.

source_sentence: 一切如來大波羅蜜多法門。
translation: It's the great perfection of wisdom dharma-gate of all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊大毘盧遮那如來。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān, the great Mahāvairocana Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來悅樂供養三昧。
translation: He then entered the concentration of all the tathāgatas' joyful offerings.
He then gave rise to the adamantine absorption.
That's the great luminous consort of the Tathāgata family.
From her own mind, she emerged.
She spoke this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)邏(引)細(引一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, the great adamantine seal that fully possesses the virtues of the Vajrasamādhi emerges.

source_sentence: 即出大金剛印具德持金剛者。
translation: He then produces the great vajra seal, the one who possesses the virtue of the vajra.
Within the vajra-seal approach, he creates an extremely tiny, dusty amount of the whole world.

source_sentence: 成一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: It creates an image of the Tathāgata that's the subtlest particle of the whole world.
They are again gathered into one body.

source_sentence: 出現金剛嬉戲大明妃像。
translation: An image of the vajra-playing great princess appears.
Her body shape is like that of a vajra-sattva, without distinction.
She has various forms, colors, and marvelous manners.
He's adorned with a multitude of adornments.

source_sentence: 總攝一切如來部金剛薩埵明妃。
translation: It's a collection of all the tathāgatas' vajrasattva majestic consorts.

source_sentence: 於世尊阿閦如來曼拏羅左月輪中。
translation: She's standing in the left moon-wheel of the Tathāgata's maṇḍala, the Bhagavān Akṣobhya.
She stood in accord with reality.
She spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉我有無等比　　諸佛上妙之供養　由知欲樂供養故　　乃能轉彼諸供養爾時世尊。
translation: "Great! I have unsurpassed abilities to make the most sublime offerings to the buddhas. Because I know I want to make enjoyable offerings, I'm able to transform those offerings.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來寶鬘灌頂三昧。
translation: He then entered the samādhi of the consecration of the jeweled crown of all tathāgatas.
He then gave rise to the adamantine absorption.
That's the great luminous consort of the Tathāgata family.
From her own mind, she emerged.
She spoke this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)摩(引)梨(引一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgata, the great jewel seal, the one who possesses the virtues of the vajrasamādhi, will emerge.

source_sentence: 即出大寶印具德持金剛者。
translation: Immediately, there arises the great precious seal, the Vajra-wielder of great virtue.
Within that great precious seal.

source_sentence: 成一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: It creates an image of the Tathāgata that's the subtlest particle in the whole world.
Again, they're gathered into one body.
An image of the great adamantine princess appears, complete with a vajra garland.
Their appearance and adornment are no different than before.

source_sentence: 於世尊寶生如來曼拏羅左月輪中。
translation: She's standing in the left moon-wheel of the Tathāgata's maṇḍala, which is the jewel of the Bhagavān.
He stood in accord with reality.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉我此無等比　　是即稱為寶供養　而彼三界最勝王　　受教令故作供養爾時世尊。
translation: "Great! I have no equal here! This is called making offerings of treasures to the most distinguished king of the three realms who has been instructed to make offerings because of this.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來妙歌三昧。
translation: He then again entered the marvelous song samādhi of all tathāgatas.
He then gave rise to the adamantine absorption.
That's the great luminous consort of the Tathāgata family.
From her own mind, she emerged.
She spoke this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)詣(引)帝(引一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, the Vajra seal of the Tathāgatas and the Vajra bearer of great virtue will emerge.

source_sentence: 即出一切如來法印具德持金剛者。
translation: Immediately, out comes the Tathāgata's Dharma seal, the Vajra-wielder of Complete Virtue.
In this Dharma-seal of the Tathāgatas, the tiny dusty amount of the whole world is formed.

source_sentence: 成一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: Tathāgata images of the whole world that are the subtlest amount of dust are formed.
Again, they are gathered into one body.

source_sentence: 出現金剛妙歌大明妃像。
translation: An image of the Vajra Wonderful Song Great Radiant Consort appears.

source_sentence: 於世尊觀自在王如來曼拏羅左月輪中。
translation: He's standing in the left moon-wheel of the Tathāgata maṇḍala of the Bhagavān, the King of Spontaneous Contemplation.
He abides in accord with reality.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉莊嚴大妙歌　　我當供養諸見者　由彼適悅供養故　　即一切法如響應爾時世尊。
translation: "Great is the adornment of the great wonderful song! I will make offerings to those who see it because it's pleasing to them to make offerings. That's when the Bhagavān responded like a resonant echo to all phenomena.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來舞供養三昧。
translation: He then enters the concentration of making offerings to all tathāgatas.
He then gives rise to the adamantine absorption.
That's the great luminous consort of the order of all tathāgatas.
From her own mind, she emerged.
She spoke this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)涅哩(二合)帝(引重呼一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, the Vajra Nirgrantha (sextuplet) Emperor (citing a repeated phrase) will appear.

source_sentence: 即現一切如來舞供養廣大法用事具德持金剛者。
translation: He instantly shows all the tathāgatas dancing and making offerings to the Vajra-wielder with great virtue in regard to the service of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 於是一切如來舞供養廣大法用事中。
translation: In this vast and great service of the Tathāgata's dance and offerings, the Dharma function.

source_sentence: 成一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: He creates images of the Tathāgatas that are the subtlest dust in the whole world.
Again, they're gathered into one body.
He then appeared as a great bright consort in the Vajra dance.

source_sentence: 於世尊不空成就如來曼拏羅左月輪中。
translation: He was standing in the left moon-wheel of the Tathāgata's maṇḍala of the Bhagavān, the Accomplished One.
He stood correctly and spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉廣大我供養　　廣作一切供養事　以金剛舞法用故　　安立諸佛妙供養此名一切如來無上悅樂三昧。
translation: "Great! Vast are my offerings! Extensive are all the offerings that are made because of the Dharma function of the vajra dance! This is called the concentration of the unsurpassed joy and happiness of all tathāgatas.
It's a garland of all the tathāgatas.
"All tathāgatas sing songs.
"All tathāgatas perform unsurpassed works.
These are the secret offerings of all the tathāgatas.
"Furthermore, the Bhagavān Akṣobhya Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 以對世尊大毘盧遮那如來供養事故。
translation: He made an offering to the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata Mahāvairocana, by telling him about it.

source_sentence: 即入一切如來大笑三昧。
translation: He then entered the great laughter samādhi of all the tathāgatas.
He then gives rise to the adamantine absorption.

source_sentence: 即一切如來誐尼迦大明妃。
translation: That's the great luminous consort of the Tathāgata Gaṇḍika.
From her own mind, she emerges.
She teaches this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)度閉(引一句)
translation: "Vajra (verse) dhūtaṃsaka (citation needed).

"When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, he immediately produces various incense offerings to a sea of clouds that adorn and surround all the adamantine realms, and he carries the adamantine with measure and virtue.

source_sentence: 即現種種香供養雲海莊嚴周遍一切金剛界量具德持金剛者。
translation: He instantly produces a variety of fragrant offerings to the adorned ocean of clouds that surround the entire vajradhātu sector and carry the vajra with measure and virtue.

source_sentence: 於是種種香供養雲海莊嚴中。
translation: From this various fragrant offerings of clouds and oceans of adornment, there arises an image of the Tathāgata that's the subtlest amount of dust in all the world.

source_sentence: 出一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: Out of that sea of clouds of offerings emerges the Tathāgata's image, which is the subtlest particle in all the worlds.
Again, it's gathered into one body.
An image of the Vajra-scented Great Radiant Concubine appeared.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣隅左月輪中。
translation: She was standing in the moon on the left side of the corner of the Vajrapaṇi's jeweled pavilion.
He stood correctly and spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉我此大供養　　金剛大笑具端嚴　由彼眾生遍入故　　速得無上菩提果爾時世尊寶生如來。
translation: "Great is this great offering of mine, the Vajra's great smile with all its finery. Because these sentient beings universally enter, they quickly attain the fruit of unsurpassed enlightenment." It was then that the Bhagavān, the Jewel-Arising Tathāgata, addressed the Bhagavān, the Great Mahāvairocana, and said.

source_sentence: 以對世尊大毘盧遮那如來供養事故。
translation: He made this offering to the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata Mahāvairocana.

source_sentence: 即入一切如來寶莊嚴供養三昧。
translation: He then entered the samādhi of making offerings to all the tathāgatas' treasures.
He then gives rise to the adamantine absorption.

source_sentence: 即一切如來鉢囉帝訶陵大明妃。
translation: That's the great luminous consort of the Tathāgata Prātimokṣa Mahāprajñāpāramitā.
From her own mind, she emerges.
She spoke this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)布瑟閉(二合引一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, the Vajra (binary) Pṛthivī (binary) will lead him to speak.

source_sentence: 即現一切華供養莊嚴周遍一切虛空界量具德持金剛者。
translation: He immediately manifests all the flowers, offerings, and adornments that circumambulate the whole space realm, and he possesses the virtues of the vajra bearer.

source_sentence: 於是一切華供養莊嚴中出。
translation: Out of this adornment of offerings of flowers comes forth.

source_sentence: 一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: From that adornment of offerings of flowers, there emerges an image of the Tathāgata that's the subtlest particle in all the world.
Again, they are gathered into one body.
He appears as a great radiant consort in the form of the vajra-flower.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣隅左月輪中。
translation: She was standing in the moon on the left side of the corner of the Vajra-mani jeweled pavilion of the Bhagavān.
He stood correctly and spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉我此華供養　　一切莊嚴妙所作　由諸如來寶性故　　速得成就諸供養爾時世尊觀自在王如來。
translation: "Great is this flower offering of mine, all its adornments and marvelous works. It's because of the treasured nature of the tathāgatas that these offerings are quickly accomplished. At the time, the Bhagavān observed the Tathāgata Āryācalanātha as the sovereign king.

source_sentence: 以對世尊大毘盧遮那如來供養事故。
translation: He responded to the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata of Mahāvairocana, about making offerings.

source_sentence: 即入一切如來燈供養三昧。
translation: He then entered the concentration of making offerings to the lamp of all tathāgatas.
He then gave rise to the vajra absorption.

source_sentence: 即一切如來訥頂大明妃。
translation: That was the great bright consort at the end of the Tathāgata's bow.
She emerges from her own mind.
She said this is the great luminosity.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合引)路(引)計(引一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, the Vajra (binary) Path (citation) calculates (citation 1).

source_sentence: 即現一切燈供養莊嚴周遍法界具德持金剛者。
translation: He instantly manifests all the lamps, offerings, and adornments that completely pervade the Dharma realm and are endowed with the virtues of the adamantine bearer.

source_sentence: 於是一切燈供養莊嚴中。
translation: From within this adornment of offerings to all lamps comes forth a tiny dusty amount of the whole world.

source_sentence: 出一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: From within the adornment of offerings from all lamps comes the image of the Tathāgata, which is a tiny particle in size, from all the worlds.
Again, they're gathered into one body.
An image of the great bright consort of the Vajra lamp appears.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣隅左月輪中。
translation: She was standing in the moon on the left side of the corner of the Vajra-mani jeweled pavilion of the Bhagavān.
She stood in accord with reality.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉我此妙廣大　　所成供養燈端嚴　由是速具光明故　　即得見彼一切佛爾時世尊不空成就如來。
translation: "Great is this marvelous, vast offering of mine, which is a lamp endowed with great splendor. Because of this quick availability of light, I was able to see all the buddhas.

source_sentence: 以對世尊大毘盧遮那如來供養事故。
translation: He made an offering to the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata of Mahāvairocana, based on that offering.

source_sentence: 即入一切如來塗香供養三昧。
translation: He then entered the concentration of making offerings with incense to all the tathāgatas.
He then gives rise to the adamantine absorption.

source_sentence: 即一切如來際微大明妃。
translation: That's the subtle, great radiant consort at the apex of all tathāgatas.
From her own mind, she emerges.
She explains this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)巘提(引一句)
translation: "Vajraka (bhūmi) peak ti (citing a phrase).

"When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, he instantly shows up with all the perfumes, offerings, and adornments that reach the whole world, and he carries the vajra with measure and virtue.

source_sentence: 即現一切塗香供養莊嚴周遍一切世界為量具德持金剛者。
translation: He instantly produces all the fragrant offerings that adorn the whole world, which are measured and endowed with the qualities of a vajra-wielder.

source_sentence: 於是一切塗香供養莊嚴中。
translation: Within that adornment of all the perfumed offerings, there arises an image of the Tathāgata that's the subtlest dust in the world.

source_sentence: 出一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: Out of all the perfumed offerings adorned by incense comes an image of the Tathāgata that's the tiniest particle in all the worlds.
Again, they're gathered into one body.

source_sentence: 出現金剛塗香大明妃像。
translation: An image of the Vajra-coated fragrance-adorned great radiant consort appears.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣隅左月輪中。
translation: She was standing in the moon on the left side of the corner of the Vajra-adorned Mani-pedestal's mansion.
She stood in accord with reality.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉塗香成供養　　我此微妙大悅意　由諸如來遍塗香　　普熏一切清淨身此名一切如來遍入智大菩提分三昧。
translation: "Great! This is my subtle, great joy because the tathāgatas are universally perfumed and perfume all pure bodies. This is called the great bodhi-part samādhi of the universal entry wisdom of all the tathāgatas.
It's the Dharma radiance of all the tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 戒定慧解脫解脫知見勝妙之香。
translation: It's a wonderful fragrance of morality, meditation, wisdom, liberation, and knowledge and vision of liberation.

source_sentence: 是即一切如來教令事業。
translation: This is the cause of all the Tathāgatas' teachings and instructions.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊大毘盧遮那如來。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata Mahāvairocana, returned to the concentration of the Tathāgatas and hooked his hook.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來三昧鉤大士三昧。
translation: He then entered the samādhi of the Tathāgatas, the hooked-up bodhisattva, and the concentration of the Tathāgata.
He gave rise to the sattva-vajra samādhi.
That's the tathāgata's seal on all sentient beings.
From their own minds, they emerge.
He explains this great teaching, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囕(二合引)酤舍(一句)
translation: "Vajradhātu (a phrase).
"When he first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas, he'll be the one who possesses the virtue to carry the vajra.
The one who possesses the virtue to wield the vajra.

source_sentence: 成一切如來鉤召三昧金剛印眾。
translation: He formed a multitude of the tathāgatas' vajra-seals for hooking and summoning samādhi.
After it appeared, he did so.

source_sentence: 於是一切如來鉤召三昧金剛印眾中。
translation: In that congregation of the tathāgatas' appealing samādhi-vajra seal.

source_sentence: 出一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: Out of that congregation came the images of Tathāgatas that were the subtlest dust in the world.
They were again gathered into one body.
Out of it arises the body of the Vajra-Hooked Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣金剛門月輪中。
translation: He was placed in the Vajra-gate moon of the Vajra-manifest jeweled pagoda of the Bhagavān.
He abides in accord with reality.
He performed the samādhi of summoning all tathāgatas by hook.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉一切正覺尊　　平等鉤召我堅固　由我普遍鉤召故　　即得集會曼拏羅爾時世尊。
translation: "Great is the honored one, the perfectly enlightened one, who has universally summoned me and made me resolute because I universally summoned him. The Bhagavān then rallied to the maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來三昧引入大士三昧。
translation: He then again entered the samādhi of all tathāgatas and introduced the samādhi of the great person.
He then gave rise to the vajra absorption.

source_sentence: 即引入一切如來印鉢囉帝訶囉。
translation: He then introduced the seal of all tathāgatas, the pārātyāhara.
He spoke this great teaching that emerged from his own mind.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)播(引)舍(一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When he first produced the mind of the Tathāgatas, he was like a buddha in the air.
He who possesses the virtue to wield the vajra.

source_sentence: 成一切如來引入三昧大印眾。
translation: He became the great sealer that introduced samādhi to all the tathāgatas.
After it appeared, he did so.

source_sentence: 於是一切如來引入三昧大印眾中。
translation: In that great multitude of samādhi seals introduced by the Tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 出一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: Out of that great seal of concentration came the images of all the Tathāgatas in the world, which are the subtlest number of dust particles.
They are again gathered into one body.
Out of that body emerged the bodhisattva Vajrapāśa.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣寶門月輪中。
translation: He was standing in the moonlight among the Bhagavān's adamantine maṇi jeweled peaks, mansions, and jeweled gates.
He abides in accord with reality.
He then introduced himself to all the tathāgatas.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉一切正覺尊　　我金剛索妙堅固　設入一切極微中　　亦復引入此三昧爾時世尊復入一切如來三昧鎖大士三昧。
translation: "Great is the honored one, the perfectly enlightened one! My vajrapāṇi's cord is marvelously strong. Suppose he enters all the very subtle things and also introduces this samādhi. The Bhagavān then again enters the samādhi of all tathāgatas, the concentration of chained great persons.
He then gave rise to the vajra absorption.
That's the samādhi of all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 縛一切如來訥多從自心出。
translation: Binding all tathāgatas, he let Nueda emerge from his own mind.
He spoke this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)塞普(二合引)吒(一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When Vajra (verse) Sepu (verse) Tcha (verse) first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas.
He who possesses the virtue to wield the vajra.

source_sentence: 成一切如來三昧縛大印眾。
translation: He formed a great multitude of seals bound in the samādhi of the Tathāgatas.
After it appeared, he did so.

source_sentence: 於是一切如來三昧縛大印眾中。
translation: Out of that great multitude of the Tathāgata's samādhi bonds, there emerged.

source_sentence: 出一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: Out of that great seal of the Tathāgata's samādhi bound masses there emerged images of the Tathāgatas from all the worlds that are the subtlest amount of dust.
They are again gathered into one body.
Out of it arises the body of the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣法門月輪中。
translation: He was standing in the moonlight of the Bhagavān's adamantine maṇi jeweled pagoda and dharma gate.
He abides in accord with reality.
He created a marvelous fetter around all the tathāgatas.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉一切正覺尊　　我金剛鎖妙堅固　由縛一切解脫者　　為眾生利還作縛爾時世尊。
translation: "Great is the honored one who is the fully enlightened one. My vajra lock is wonderfully strong, and it binds all those who are liberated. I'll create another binding for the benefit of sentient beings." At that point, the Bhagavān entered all tathāgatas and universally entered the great gate.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來遍入大士三昧。
translation: He then entered the samādhi of the Tathāgatas, the universally entering bodhisattvas, and the vajra samādhi.
He then gave rise to the adamantine absorption.

source_sentence: 即一切如來一切印際吒。
translation: That is, the tathāgatas all seal the border.
It comes forth from his own mind.
He spoke this great luminosity, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合引)吠(引)舍(一句)纔出一切如來心時。
translation: "When Vajra (a phrase in the Sanskrit text) Vaiśravaṇa (a phrase in the Sanskrit text) first emerges from the mind of the Tathāgatas.
"Vajra-holder of great virtue.

source_sentence: 成一切如來普遍警覺印眾。
translation: He formed a multitude of the tathāgatas' universally alert mudrās.
After it appeared, he became the seal of universal vigilance of all tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 於是一切如來普遍警覺印眾中。
translation: From within that congregation of the universal awakening mudrā of the Tathāgatas, there emerged.

source_sentence: 出一切世界極微塵量等如來像。
translation: Out of that multitude of the Tathāgatas' universally awakening signs appeared the Tathāgata images of all the worlds, which are tiny dust motes in size.
They are again gathered into one body.
Out of it arises the body of the Vajraghaṇṭā Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣羯摩門月輪中。
translation: He was standing in the moon-wheel of the Vajrapaṇi jeweled peak, tower, and karmic gate of the Bhagavān.
He stood in accord with reality.
He universally awakens all tathāgatas.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉一切正覺尊　　此金剛鈴我堅固　由為一切主宰故　　亦復作彼諸僕使此名一切如來三昧鉤召。
translation: "Great is the honored one, the Correct Enlightenment of All Tathāgatas! This vajra bell is strong in me because I'm the master of all things. I'll also be their servant and cause them to be called the samādhi hook of all tathāgatas.
"The tathāgatas bring in all the tathāgatas.
"All tathāgatas are wonderfully bound.
All tathāgatas are beloved.

source_sentence: 如是等依一切如來教令所作。
translation: Such is the work that's done based on the teachings and commands of all the Tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 復次世尊大毘盧遮那如來。
translation: "Furthermore, the Bhagavān, the Mahāvairocana, is the Tathāgata.
With the power of empowerment, he made a finger-snapping gesture.
He universally summoned all tathāgatas.
He explained this clarification of the mind that summons and strengthens, saying.

source_sentence: 嚩日囉(二合)三摩(引)惹(一句)由是羅嚩剎那牟呼栗多中。
translation: "Vajra(ii) samādhi(citation needed) is thus in Rājagṛha, Sana, and Muhūrta.
That is, after the tathāgatas mutually alerted each other.
He universally spreads the sea of clouds in all the worlds.
They are all extremely tiny particles in the world.
All the tathāgatas and bodhisattva attendants.

source_sentence: 悉來集此大曼拏羅金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣。
translation: They all came and gathered here in the tower of the great maṇḍala, the adamantine, precious maṇḍala peak.

source_sentence: 至世尊大毘盧遮那如來所。
translation: They went to the Bhagavān, the great Mahāvairocana Tathāgata.
He said this is the great clarification of universal salutation.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩哩嚩(二合)怛他(引)誐多播(引)捺滿捺喃(引)迦嚕(引)彌(引一句)以如是自性成就大明。
translation: "Om (citation needed) sarīva (binary) tantra (citation needed) gaṭapā (citation needed) namaṇḍan (citation needed) garuḍa (citation needed) mi (citation needed) with this great knowledge of the accomplishment of self-nature.

source_sentence: 隨所樂誦普禮一切如來足已。
translation: After reciting whatever he liked, he universally worshipped the feet of all the tathāgatas.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉諸佛大普賢　　是諸菩薩妙敬議　一切如來大輪壇　　影現一切如來像作是說已。
translation: "Great is the Buddha, the great Samantabhadra, the wonderful reverence of the bodhisattvas, the great altar of the Tathāgatas, and the reflection of the images of the Tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 是時十方世界所來集會一切如來并諸菩薩。
translation: That was when all the tathāgatas and bodhisattvas from the worlds of the ten directions gathered here.

source_sentence: 以彼一切如來加持力故。
translation: It was because of the empowering power of those Tathāgatas that they assembled.

source_sentence: 混入世尊大毘盧遮那如來心。
translation: They were blended into the mind of the Bhagavān, the great Mahāvairocana Tathāgata.
Also, from the minds of all the tathāgatas, they each emerged from the assembly of bodhisattvas.
Each one came from the assembly of bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 於世尊金剛摩尼寶峯樓閣。
translation: They were placed in the Vajrapaṇi jeweled pavilion of the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 周匝圍繞同住三摩地中。
translation: They were surrounded by them and stayed together in the samādhi.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 大哉一切正覺尊　　廣大無始本來生　由是一切微塵數　　同證清淨一佛性爾時十方一切世界所來集會一切如來。
translation: "Great is the honored one, the Completely Awakened One! Vast and beginningless was originally born! Since these are all numberless particles, they all realize the pure, single Buddha-nature together.

source_sentence: 咸悉於此金剛界大曼拏羅中。
translation: They were all present in this great maṇḍala of the vajradhātu.
With the power of an empowering force.
Throughout the entirety and without remainder of the world of sentient beings.
They all worked extensively to rescue and protect them.
They all will attain benefit and well-being.

source_sentence: 乃至得一切如來平等智通最上悉地殊勝果等。
translation: It's up to them to attain the extraordinary fruit of the supreme attainment of the equal knowledge and penetration of all tathāgatas.
It was then that the tathāgatas shared their encouragement of the accomplishment of all virtuous ones.

source_sentence: 咸共勸請具德一切如來增上主宰自金剛薩埵無始無終大持金剛者。
translation: They all together encouraged the Vajrasattva, the supreme lord of all the Tathāgatas, to be the great vajra-holder without beginning or end.

source_sentence: 以是一百八名勸請稱讚。
translation: They praised him with these 108 invocations.
The verse goes.

source_sentence: 金剛勇猛大正士　　是即金剛諸如來　由普賢性金剛初　　聖金剛手我頂禮　彼金剛王妙勝覺　　金剛鉤即諸如來　金剛最上不空王　　金剛鉤召我頂禮　金剛敬愛大妙樂　　而金剛箭善調伏　魔欲最勝大金剛　　彼金剛弓我頂禮　金剛善哉妙生勝　　金剛極喜即大樂　最上金剛歡喜王　　彼金剛喜我頂禮　金剛妙寶堅固利　　金剛虛空大摩尼　金剛豐盛虛空藏　　彼金剛藏我頂禮　金剛妙光大熾焰　　金剛聖日即佛光　金剛圓光大照明　　大金剛光我頂禮　金剛寶幢善利生　　金剛表剎妙歡喜　妙寶幢相即金剛　　彼金剛剎我頂禮　金剛喜笑大適悅　　金剛笑即大希有　大喜大樂金剛初　　金剛妙悅我頂禮　金剛妙法真實理　　金剛蓮華妙清淨　觀照自在金剛眼　　彼金剛眼我頂禮　金剛利即大乘法　　而金剛劍大器仗　金剛甚深妙吉祥　　彼金剛慧我頂禮　金剛因即金剛場　　金剛妙輪大理趣　如教善轉金剛起　　彼金剛場我頂禮　最上妙明金剛語　　金剛持誦善成就　無言金剛勝悉地　　彼金剛語我頂禮　金剛事業妙教令　　如金剛業善遍行　金剛不空極廣大　　金剛巧業我頂禮　金剛守護大精進　　金剛甲冑大堅固　最勝勤勇極難敵　　金剛精進我頂禮　金剛藥叉大方便　　金剛利牙大恐怖　摧伏魔力勝金剛　　金剛暴怒我頂禮　妙金剛拳大威力　　而金剛拳善解脫　金剛堅固勝三昧　　彼金剛拳我頂禮　如是百八寂靜名　　若有常能受持者　彼於金剛灌頂等　　一切所作勝成就　如是最上祕密名　　大持金剛此稱讚　若有常伸歌詠者　　得與金剛手無異　我所稱讚如是等　　持金剛者百八名　大乘現證三昧門　　此即流布妙理趣　我所勸請汝聖等　　願說最上自儀軌　謂一切佛大智輪　　最勝金剛曼拏羅佛說一切如來真實攝大乘現證三昧大教王經卷第四
translation: 金剛勇猛大正士　　是即金剛諸如來　由普賢性金剛初　　聖金剛手我頂禮　彼金剛王妙勝覺　　金剛鉤即諸如來　金剛最上不空王　　金剛鉤召我頂禮　金剛敬愛大妙樂　　而金剛箭善調伏　魔欲最勝大金剛　　彼金剛弓我頂禮　金剛善哉妙生勝　　金剛極喜即大樂　最上金剛歡喜王　　彼金剛喜我頂禮　金剛妙寶堅固利　　金剛虛空大摩尼　金剛豐盛虛空藏　　彼金剛藏我頂禮　金剛妙光大熾焰　　金剛聖日即佛光　金剛圓光大照明　　大金剛光我頂禮　金剛寶幢善利生　　金剛表剎妙歡喜　妙寶幢相即金剛　　彼金剛剎我頂禮　金剛喜笑大適悅　　金剛笑即大希有　大喜大樂金剛初　　金剛妙悅我頂禮　金剛妙法真實理　　金剛蓮華妙清淨　觀照自在金剛眼　　彼金剛眼我頂禮　金剛利即大乘法　　而金剛劍大器仗　金剛甚深妙吉祥　　彼金剛慧我頂禮　金剛因即金剛場　　金剛妙輪大理趣　如教善轉金剛起　　彼金剛場我頂禮　最上妙明金剛語　　金剛持誦善成就　無言金剛勝悉地　　彼金剛語我頂禮　金剛事業妙教令　　如金剛業善遍行　金剛不空極廣大　　金剛巧業我頂禮　金剛守護大精進　　金剛甲冑大堅固　最勝勤勇極難敵　　金剛精進我頂禮　金剛藥叉大方便　　金剛利牙大恐怖　摧伏魔力勝金剛　　金剛暴怒我頂禮　妙金剛拳大威力　　而金剛拳善解脫　金剛堅固勝三昧　　彼金剛拳我頂禮　如是百八寂靜名　　若有常能受持者　彼於金剛灌頂等　　一切所作勝成就　如是最上祕密名　　大持金剛此稱讚　若有常伸歌詠者　　得與金剛手無異　我所稱讚如是等　　持金剛者百八名　大乘現證三昧門　　此即流布妙理趣　我所勸請汝聖等　　願說最上自儀軌　謂一切佛大智輪　　最勝金剛曼拏羅佛說一切如來真實攝大乘現證三昧大教王經卷第四
